name: Elise Martin
routine: Elise is usually in bed by 10pm and wakes up at 5:45am for an early morning run.
occupation: Elise works as a civil lawyer and spends her workdays from 9am to 6pm in court or preparing cases in her office.
thoughts: She has been pondering the implications of a recent ruling and is preparing an appeal to submit by February 4th, 2024.
lifestyle: Following a mostly vegan diet, Elise enjoys fresh, farm-to-table meals and takes pride in her urban gardening project. For relaxation, she prefers reading legal thrillers and practices mindfulness meditation to manage her stressful work life.

name: Irina Smirnov
routine: Irina goes to sleep by 11 pm and wakes up at 6 am to prepare breakfast for her family.
occupation: Irina Smirnov is the owner of a small bookstore and usually opens the shop at 10 am after dropping her kids off at school.
thoughts: Irina was planning a special Valentine's Day book signing event in her store on 2024-02-04 with a local author.
lifestyle: Irina enjoys a cozy lifestyle, often hosting intimate gatherings with friends and family, always accompanied by her home-cooked meals.

name: Raakel Vartiainen
routine: Raakel sleeps at around 12am and wakes up at 7am, then cycles to her studio.
occupation: Raakel is a graphic designer in Helsinki, typically working from 9 am to 5 pm at a local firm.
thoughts: She's excited about her new freelance project which will start rolling out on February 2nd, 2024, but also a bit nervous about balancing the additional workload.
lifestyle: Raakel prefers minimalistic living, enjoys foraging and cooking with locally-sourced ingredients, and loves to unwind with indie music on vinyl.
